TunableList.name: _elements
TunableList.description: The list of elements in the dynamic enumeration.

TunableList.name: PICKER_DATA_GROUPS
TunableList.description: A mapping between purchase picker groups and tuning relating to the various limited data that can be provided from the picker.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: The purchase picker group type that this set of purchase picker limited items is linked to.

TunableList.name: value
TunableList.description: List of categories of items we will pick from to fulfill the items provider. Number of those items are limited.

TunableList.name: items_list
TunableList.description: These are items within this category we will pick randomly to fulfill the items provider. Key is the object definition, weight is the relative chance they will be picked.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: The object definition we are creating from.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: The relative weight of this object. Higher weight has higher chance to be picked.

Tunable.name: number_of_types_of_items
Tunable.description: This will be used to limit the number of types of items in this category. Say we have 6 kinds of items in the category. If this value is set to 2 we will randomly select 2 kinds from the 6.

Tunable.name: quantity_for_each_item
Tunable.description: Available number of items in each picked kind of item. For example if we have apple and pear picked, and this number is 3, then eventually we will have 3 apples and 3 pears in the vendor's sell picker.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: A series of tests that must pass in order for this entire category to be picked by the provider.

TunableTuple.name: REFRESH_TIME
TunableTuple.description: The time of day that the items will refresh in the picker.
